message: I can always count on Bernie supporters to add what they think is 'wit and humor' but sounds more akin to childish antics. I am surprised that there haven't been any conspiracy comments about Mississippi!

Under national security, I left out that her team lost an entire laptop in the mail, that she had not one blackberry but 13 successive BlackBerries, and five iPads. Sometimes she went back-and-forth between blackberries. When they swapped out blackberries they often did not know where the one she abandoned were. They could not be recovered to be examined to see if they had been compromised. One staff member acknowledged having destroyed two, One with a hammer. Between the laptop and those blackberries floating around, they may not have needed Internet hackers to compromise the files.

There comes a point in time when you simply draw the line. What is more important, being diplomatic or standing by and watching these countries behead our citizens with a steak knife? What is more important, your """"relationship"""" with these countries or allowing them to burn our flag, rape our citizens, kidnap and torture American's? Is it being diplomatic to allow terrorist groups into this country by the millions and give them ample opportunity for a repeat of 911? I guess the most diplomatic part would be letting our veterans, elderly and poor starve and be denied the health care they so desperately need and instead give it to illegal immigrants? Which do you think is more diplomatic? Personally, I do not think ANY of them are qualified to do the job, but I am ready for someone who is tired of the bullshit we have lived with for so long to end! He owes nobody because nobody owns him or has invested in his candidacy. He does not care whose feelings are hurt or who gets offended. He is out for the American people and this country first! A trait that many of our fore fathers shared with him when this country was strong and feared by other nations! We need to be in that position again. We need someone who will tell them to take their oil and shove it up their asses and try to eat sand for dinner! The price will come down if the food stops leaving this country and headed in their direction. It is time for good old fashion leadership gets back in the white house! Like it or not, he has a back bone that the others simply do not have!
What you are advocating the banning of white males? I am onboard, this terror act was committed by a radicalized right wing white christian male.
